name: NoBS - Grab The Monkey
description:
The game was created by Jonathan Lansdale and myself for the Movie Game Jam 2018. It was created in 10 days based on a favorite movie scene; the scene we chose was Indiana Jones and The Raiders of the Lost Ark. Specifically the scene where Indiana takes the golden statue which starts a run-for-your-life scenario. This was the first game jam either of us took part in so please enjoy our game! 

Press 'A' and 'D' to move left and right, 'Space' to jump, 'R' resets to title.
